ironborn.name: Ironborn
ironborn.ancestralMemory: The Ironborn remember the First Forge, deep in the Ashpeak mountains, where their ancestors tamed fire and steel.

crownlanders.name: Crownlanders
crownlanders.proverb: "A crown is earned at the table, not the battlefield."
crownlanders.ancestralMemory: The Crownlanders trace their line to the River Council, where seven chieftains broke bread and swore the First Compact.

shieldfolk.name: Shieldfolk
shieldfolk.ancestralMemory: The Shieldfolk were born from the Wardens who stood against the Shadow Tide, holding the passes when all seemed lost.

mosswalkers.name: Mosswalkers
mosswalkers.proverb: "The forest speaks to those who learn to be still."
mosswalkers.ancestralMemory: The Mosswalkers believe they were the first to hear the Heartwood sing ‚Äî the deep vibration of the oldest tree in creation.

canopiers.name: Canopiers
canopiers.proverb: "Those who fear falling never learn to fly."
canopiers.ancestralMemory: The Canopiers say their first mother climbed the World-Tree and never came down, building the first sky-village among its branches.

rootkeepers.name: Rootkeepers
rootkeepers.proverb: "Every oak was once an acorn with the courage to grow."
rootkeepers.ancestralMemory: The Rootkeepers guard the Seed Vaults ‚Äî ancient caches of every plant that ever lived, hidden in root caverns.

windrunners.name: Windrunners
windrunners.proverb: "A Windrunner tied down is a Windrunner already dead."
windrunners.ancestralMemory: They say the first Windrunner caught the tail of a cyclone and rode it across the steppe, mapping every horizon.

sandshapers.name: Sandshapers
sandshapers.proverb: "The desert gives nothing freely ‚Äî and teaches everything."
sandshapers.ancestralMemory: The Sandshapers remember the Year of Glass, when lightning struck the great dunes and their ancestors forged the first desert-glass mirrors.

bonecarvers.name: Bonecarvers
bonecarvers.proverb: "Honor the beast, and its spirit will run with you forever."
bonecarvers.ancestralMemory: The Bonecarvers carry the Great Tusk ‚Äî a mammoth bone inscribed with the names of every tribe elder for a thousand years.

sunweavers.name: Sunweavers
sunweavers.proverb: "Every dawn is proof that darkness cannot last."
sunweavers.ancestralMemory: The Sunweavers tell of a time when the sun died for three days, and their ancestor wove a cloth of pure light to call it back.

ashpilgrims.name: Ashpilgrims
ashpilgrims.ancestralMemory: The Ashpilgrims were born when a volcano buried their village. The survivors walked through the ash for forty days and emerged enlightened.

starcallers.name: Starcallers
starcallers.proverb: "We are all stardust, remembering where we came from."
starcallers.ancestralMemory: The Starcallers claim their founder once climbed a tower so high she touched the stars and brought back a fragment of cosmic truth.

tidecallers.name: Tidecallers
tidecallers.proverb: "The tide waits for no one, but rewards those who know its rhythm."
tidecallers.ancestralMemory: The Tidecallers built the first sea-wall ‚Äî a living barrier of coral and stone that protected their village from the Great Tsunami.

deepdivers.name: Deepdivers
deepdivers.proverb: "The greatest treasures are found where others fear to go."
deepdivers.ancestralMemory: The Deepdivers discovered the Sunken City ‚Äî an ancient civilization beneath the waves ‚Äî and traded its secrets for generations.

sailweavers.name: Sailweavers
sailweavers.proverb: "A good ship and a fair wind ‚Äî what more could the heart desire?"
sailweavers.ancestralMemory: The Sailweavers built the Eternal Fleet ‚Äî ships so masterfully crafted that some still sail, crewed by the descendants of their original builders.

lorekeepers.name: Lorekeepers
lorekeepers.proverb: "A people without records are a people without roots."
lorekeepers.ancestralMemory: The Lorekeepers descend from the Archivists of the Sunken Library, who saved ten thousand scrolls from the Great Flood by carrying them on their backs across the mountains.

thornwardens.name: Thornwardens
thornwardens.proverb: "Beauty and pain grow from the same stem."
thornwardens.ancestralMemory: The Thornwardens grew the Great Briar Wall ‚Äî a living barrier of thorns a hundred feet high ‚Äî that held back an invading army for a generation.

frostborn.name: Frostborn
frostborn.proverb: "The cold does not care. And neither shall we."
frostborn.ancestralMemory: The Frostborn survived the Long Winter ‚Äî seven years of endless snow ‚Äî by building cities inside glaciers and learning to farm the frost itself.

icewalkers.name: Icewalkers
icewalkers.proverb: "Walk softly on the ice, for the world is thin beneath us."
icewalkers.ancestralMemory: The Icewalkers once followed a white elk across a frozen ocean for forty days, discovering a hidden land of hot springs where they built their sacred winter refuge.

aurorans.name: Aurorans
aurorans.proverb: "The lights above are the dreams of the earth."
aurorans.ancestralMemory: The Aurorans believe their ancestors once spoke with the aurora itself, learning the language of light, and that each color carries a different truth.

deepdelvers.name: Deepdelvers
deepdelvers.proverb: "Dig deep enough and you will find the bones of the world."
deepdelvers.ancestralMemory: The Deepdelvers carved the Underhall ‚Äî a cathedral-sized cavern deep beneath the mountains ‚Äî where every surface glitters with embedded gems left by ancient rivers.

glowkin.name: Glowkin
glowkin.proverb: "In the deepest dark, we became our own light."
glowkin.ancestralMemory: The Glowkin were once surface dwellers who fled a great catastrophe underground, and over generations learned to cultivate the living lights of the deep caves.

crystalsmiths.name: Crystalsmiths
crystalsmiths.proverb: "Perfection is not achieved ‚Äî it is revealed, facet by facet."
crystalsmiths.ancestralMemory: The Crystalsmiths discovered the Singing Cavern ‚Äî a place where crystals of impossible size hum in perfect harmony, said to be the heartbeat of the world itself.

runespeakers.name: Runespeakers
runespeakers.proverb: "Every word carved in stone outlasts the hand that carved it."
runespeakers.ancestralMemory: The Runespeakers claim their founder discovered the First Rune ‚Äî a symbol of such power it split a mountain in two ‚Äî and swore to guard it and all runes that followed.

veilwalkers.name: Veilwalkers
veilwalkers.proverb: "The veil is thin for those with eyes to see."
veilwalkers.ancestralMemory: The Veilwalkers arose at a place where the world is thin ‚Äî a misty bog where the living and the dead can speak. They serve as intermediaries between realms.

dreamweavers.name: Dreamweavers
dreamweavers.proverb: "What we dream tonight, the world becomes tomorrow."
dreamweavers.ancestralMemory: The Dreamweavers learned to weave shared dreams ‚Äî a single night where an entire tribe dreams together ‚Äî and from those visions, they built their first city.

skyherders.name: Skyherders
skyherders.proverb: "From the heights, all borders are illusions."
skyherders.ancestralMemory: The Skyherders followed the great eagles to the roof of the world, where they discovered hidden valleys above the clouds and built the Sky Roads ‚Äî mountain paths only they can navigate.

reefbuilders.name: Reefbuilders
reefbuilders.proverb: "Build with the sea, not against it, and your walls will outlast stone."
reefbuilders.ancestralMemory: The Reefbuilders grew an entire island from living coral over seven generations ‚Äî a testament to patience and cooperation that stands to this day.

embersmiths.name: Embersmiths
embersmiths.proverb: "We do not fear the fire ‚Äî we are the fire."
embersmiths.ancestralMemory: The Embersmiths were born when a volcano's heart cracked open and their ancestors dared to reach inside, pulling out the first Everflame ‚Äî a fire that has never gone out.

marshborn.name: Marshborn
marshborn.proverb: "The swamp swallows the proud and shelters the humble."
marshborn.ancestralMemory: The Marshborn fled into the deepest bogs when invaders came, and the swamp hid them so well that their enemies believed them vanished. They have never left.

evolutionStages.name: Nomadic Band
evolutionStages.description: Small kinship groups wandering the land

evolutionStages.name: Tribal Camp
evolutionStages.description: Seasonal camps where tribes gather for trade and marriage

evolutionStages.name: Chiefdom
evolutionStages.description: A powerful chief unites several bands under one rule

evolutionStages.name: Village
evolutionStages.description: Settled communities with shared governance and craft specialization

evolutionStages.name: Town
evolutionStages.description: A thriving hub where multiple peoples have intermingled for generations

evolutionStages.name: City
evolutionStages.description: A great city where diverse subcultures form distinct quarters and guilds

evolutionStages.name: Metropolis
evolutionStages.description: A cosmopolitan center where cultures fuse into something new

FESTIVAL.name: Joint Festival
FESTIVAL.description: Celebrating together builds bonds across cultural lines

SHARED_DEFENSE.name: Shared Defense
SHARED_DEFENSE.description: Standing together against a common threat forges deep unity

RIVALRY.name: Cultural Rivalry
RIVALRY.description: Old grudges and competing traditions cause friction

CUISINE_FUSION.name: Cuisine Fusion
CUISINE_FUSION.description: Blending culinary traditions creates beloved new dishes

ART_EXCHANGE.name: Artistic Exchange
ART_EXCHANGE.description: Artists from different traditions inspire each other

KNOWLEDGE_SHARING.name: Knowledge Sharing
KNOWLEDGE_SHARING.description: Scholars and elders exchange ancient wisdom across cultural lines

BLOOD_FEUD.name: Blood Feud
BLOOD_FEUD.description: An ancient wrong festers into open hostility between peoples

MIGRATION.name: Migration
MIGRATION.description: A displaced people arrives, straining local resources and trust

SHARED_HARVEST.name: Shared Harvest
SHARED_HARVEST.description: Working the land together forges bonds of mutual dependence

LANGUAGE_BLEND.name: Language Blending
LANGUAGE_BLEND.description: Pidgin tongues and shared phrases emerge from daily contact

MYSTICAL_CONVERGENCE.name: Mystical Convergence
MYSTICAL_CONVERGENCE.description: A shared supernatural experience unites peoples in awe
